subject: Burnt out board
description_text:
Hello,

yesterday, I started to have some weird interference in my pedals, whenever
they vibrated, they got like a 1-3% pulse, so whenever i was shifting, the
brake went to 3%, today, the main board from the pedals burnt out, at least
by the smell of it, what should I do? can you send me a new one? I got your
pedals like month ago..

order number: #SSN2712

conversations.body_text: Hi Matěj Pavlát,  You can use the included nylon washers and nylon screws to install the VAM Pro motor, which should solve your issue. You can refer to this post for guidance. Rest assured, the control unit will not be damaged.      https://www.reddit.com/r/simracing/comments/1n291hi/solution_for_simsonn_vam_pro_emi_issues/     https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding

I don’t thin you read that well, the control board doesn’t work, windows is showing it as unrecognizable and there was clearly a smell of something burnt, the pedals works fine with older control board.

Odesláno z aplikace Outlook pro iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
